    level="1"
    right="Shield 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Caster's Targe](/Shields.aspx?ID=5)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Inscribed" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=480" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 20 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
**Price** 2 gp

**AC Bonus** 1 

**Speed Penalty** —
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Bulk** 1

**Hardness** 3

**HP (BT)** 12 (6)
</row>

</column>

---

This small shield is made from wood. It features a special panel of parchment along the inside surface that allows for writing.
